card.name: Harry Potter the Gathering Commander Decks
card.text: Corruption of the Dark Arts GUBR Commander: Delphini Diggory, Dark Heir Theme: Commit a crime and opponent manipulation (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.) Fantastic Beasts & Where to Find Them RGWB Commander:Qilin, Elector of the Supreme Mugwump Theme: Beasts Tribal, Monarch Group Hug Ministry Crackdown WUBR Commander:Rufus Scrimger, Auror Minister Theme: Control Guardians of the Phoenix RWGU Commander: Alaster Moody, Keeper of the Order of the Phoenix Theme: Bolstering creatures on the field

card.name: Harry Potter the Gathering Draft Archetypes
card.text: THE DARK ARTS UBR Commit a crime (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.) GRYFFINDOR RGW *Gallant X (Whenever a creature an opponent controls with greater power enters or attacks and that creature isn’t courageous, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature and it becomes courageous.) HUFFLEPUFF WBG Behold a Beast, plant, or Wizard (To behold a Beast, plant, or Wizard, choose a Beast, plant, or Wizard you control or reveal a Beast, plant, or Wizard card from your hand.) RAVENCLAW URW *Studious X (As long as you have X or more cards in your hand, this creature gets +X/+0 and is studious.) As long as this creature is studious, effect. SLYTHERIN GBU *Presence <Cost> — Whenver a creature you control enters, you may <pay cost>.If you do effect. WUBRG BEASTS Squad X (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {X} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.) INCANTATIONS Incantation storm (When you cast this spell, copy if for each Incantation cast before it this turn. Copies become tokens.) Alteration {X} (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Its controller may cast it from the battlefield for {X}.)

card.name: Blast Ended Screwt Token
card.text: Squad RRGGWW Trample, menace Whenever this creature deals combat damage to another creature, if you control this creature, tap the other creature and put a stun counter on it. 2RRR, {T}: Blast Ended Screwt deals damage equal to its power divided among any number of target permanents.

card.name: Death Eater Token
card.text: Squad 3B Whenever you commit a crime, each opponent may pay {1}. Each opponent that doesn’t, loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the amount lost this way. (Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)
